subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Basketball
Drug Abuse and Traffic
lead_paragraph: Mr. Tarpley was a former Dallas Mavericks star center whose promising N.B.A. career was cut short by drug abuse, leading the league to bar him twice.
snippet: Mr. Tarpley was a former Dallas Mavericks star center whose promising N.B.A. career was cut short by drug abuse, leading the league to bar him twice.
